mapper.select: SELECT m.manager_idx, m.manager_brandname, m.manager_info, m.MANAGER_ADMINAUTH, m.manager_original_file, m.manager_del_yn, cnt.brand_itemCnt FROM manager m LEFT JOIN (select re_manager_idx, count(*) AS brand_itemCnt FROM item GROUP BY re_manager_idx ) AS cnt ON m.manager_idx = cnt.re_manager_idx WHERE m.manager_adminauth = 'Y' AND m.manager_del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY ( CASE WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(manager_brandname,1)) BETWEEN 48 AND 57 THEN 3 WHEN ASCII(SUBSTRING(manager_brandname,1)) > 123 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ), manager_brandname

SELECT m.manager_idx, m.manager_brandname, m.manager_info, m.MANAGER_ADMINAUTH, m.manager_original_file, m.manager_del_yn, cnt.brand_itemCnt, f.brand_follower FROM manager m LEFT JOIN (select re_manager_idx, count(*) AS brand_itemCnt FROM item GROUP BY re_manager_idx ) AS cnt ON m.manager_idx = cnt.re_manager_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT rf_manager_idx,count(*) AS brand_follower FROM follow GROUP BY rf_manager_idx) AS f ON m.manager_idx = f.rf_manager_idx WHERE m.manager_adminauth = 'Y' AND m.manager_del_yn = 'N' AND m.manager_idx = #{manager_idx}

SELECT i.item_idx, i.re_manager_idx, i.item_name, i.item_info, i.item_packing, i.item_category, i.item_price, i.item_sale, i.item_stock, i.item_status, i.item_readcount, i.item_date, f.file1, m.manager_brandname, m.manager_original_file, round(truncate( a.board_star_score,1),0) AS score, truncate( a.board_star_score,1) AS board_star_score, cnt.brand_itemCnt FROM item i LEFT JOIN file_item f ON i.item_idx = f.rf_item_idx JOIN manager m ON i.re_manager_idx = m.manager_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.BOARD_ITEM_IDX , avg(s.board_star_score) AS board_star_score FROM board b join board_star s ON b.board_idx = s.rf_board_idx GROUP BY b.BOARD_ITEM_IDX) a ON i.item_idx = a.BOARD_ITEM_IDX LEFT JOIN (select re_manager_idx, count(*) AS brand_itemCnt FROM item GROUP BY re_manager_idx ) AS cnt ON m.manager_idx = cnt.RE_MANAGER_IDX WHERE f.file1 NOT LIKE '%상세%'
AND i.re_manager_idx = #{manager_idx}
ORDER BY
i.item_idx DESC
ABS(i.item_price) ASC
ABS(i.item_price) DESC
rand()
